title: Golf: 50 steps to improve your game
brief_description: Hosted by professional golf teacher Richard Bradbeer and presented in 5 common sense sections - getting ready, getting started, getting round, getting out of trouble, and getting it in the hole, this tape provides 50 golfing tips for novices and experts alike. Addresses key golfing questions such as “How can I avoid the slice”? “What do I need?” “What’s the best way to tackle the ball?”. As well as many others.
